properties.areaDesc: Block Island Sound; Rhode Island Sound
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 6 at 3:12AM EST until February 7 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, east winds 5 to 15 kt
with gusts up to 25 kt and seas 6 to 9 feet. For the Gale
Watch, southwest winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt and
seas 9 to 14 feet possible.

* WHERE...Rhode Island Sound and Block Island Sound.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 7 AM EST Friday.
For the Gale Watch, from Friday morning through late Friday
night.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST FRIDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT
